title: First Steps - Quick Tutorial
author: Entertrained
description: A step-by-step guide that kickstarts your adventure into the world of touch typing
longDescription: Reading this manual will equip you with the knowledge and skills to fully utilize Entertrained, a platform designed to make learning touch typing an enjoyable experience. It will guide you on how to practice typing with famous novels, enhancing your accuracy and speed.

The manual also introduces a Reading mode, a feature that allows you to continue enjoying the story even when youâ€™re taking a break from typing. It will show you how to customize your experience, making it truly yours.
